data.name: ISO 27001
data.description: ISO 27001:2013 is a global standard for establishing, implementing, maintaining, and improving an Information Security Management System (ISMS). It provides a comprehensive set of controls to help organizations secure their information.

data.name: ISO 20000
data.description: ISO/IEC 20000 is an international standard for IT service management. It helps organizations manage IT services and align them with business goals. It provides a framework for managing and delivering IT services effectively.
